# OneNoteProxy.FindPages method

Find pages by full text search

```csharp
public XDocument FindPages(string scopeID, string query)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| query | query string |
| scopeID | OneNote id of the scope to search for pages. This is the element ID of a notebook, section group, or section. If given as null or empty string scope is the entire set of notebooks open in OneNote. |

## Return Value

XML page descriptors
